title: The One Where They Eat, Drink & Be Merry Guilt Free for the Holidays
description:
So much to be thankful for including this brand-new Give Them Lala pod! Lala is doing it solo, and shares some of the fun with assistant Jessica, and Jessica’s boyfriend, Kyle Lampi! Kyle is a fitness trainer and nutritionist and offers plenty of tips on how to eat your way through Thanksgiving and NOT pay for it later or feel guilty about it! They also talk love languages, the importance of quality time, and runaway shower heads!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Lala Kent | Cumulus Podcast Network
